name: Space Questionmark
description:
Do you think you could survive in space?
Well then, give it your best shot!

You have to repair the machines that break aboard the space station, otherwise... you'll die! Space is dangerous!

Instructions are included in the game.

(Note: maybe it's not actually possible to survive in space. Who knows?)

This was made for the AGDSJam #1, at Abertay University. It's just a small jam game, but I hope you have fun! The jam theme was "Is It Broken?"

Thanks to Kyle Pulver for the Otter2D engine. It's very good.
